Name: ApiGatewayModel
Documentation: The AWS::ApiGateway::Model resource defines the structure of a request or response payload for an Amazon API Gateway (API Gateway) method.

Parameters.Name: ContentType
Parameters.Documentation: The content type for the model.

Parameters.Name: Description
Parameters.Documentation: A description that identifies this model.

Parameters.Name: Name
Parameters.Documentation:
A name for the mode. If you don't specify a name, AWS CloudFormation generates a unique physical ID and uses that ID for the model name. For more information, see Name Type.
Important
If you specify a name, you cannot do updates that require this resource to be replaced. You can still do updates that require no or some interruption. If you must replace the resource, specify a new name.

Parameters.Name: RestApiId
Parameters.Documentation: The ID of a REST API with which to associate this model.

Parameters.Name: Schema
Parameters.Documentation: The schema to use to transform data to one or more output formats.
